title: Veggie Bros
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern
description: Vegetarian restaurant with mostly vegan dishes (only 2 of the 6 sauces are not vegan due to yogurt and honey). Falafel wraps, falafel plates, salads, fries, and vegan brownies are offered. Small seating area for about 15 people, but everything is available to-go in compostable/recyclable packaging.
